description:My Personal hunting rolls

//notes: My favorite looking gun for PvE. Best is Corkscrew/Tactical Mag/Sub/Rampage With Reload Masterwork for Add clear. For Champions long range different auto rifle for sure. Instead of Tactical could go accurized but I'd like to stack reload to keep hosing enemies. tags:pve

// The Messenger - PvP Rapid Hit perfect (god-pvp,pvp)
//notes: God Roll Alert! Fun to machine gun with a pulse. This requires more stability with desperado active. Stability masterwork over range would be ok for this. Any third col stability is good. Perpetual is easy to activate, otherwise rapid hit hitting crits. Heating up if you final blow opponents, but it also fixes accuracy and recoil, so with heating up counter balance might not be needed, but you'll be variable consistency. tags:god-pvp,pvp
